name: PlanetRush
description:
Comets fall on the planet and you need to destroy them to avoid the apocalypse. But fortunately, people managed to build a magic shield that will help you protect the planet. But this spehre is not ifnity. if the energy of the magic shield starts to fall, you can restore it by holding down the specific buttons. The game also has various skins that can be bought for in-game currency. So far, there are 3 of them, but in the future there will be more.

The game was made in 50 hours and I was helped with they: ccsv - drawed Ashot`s skins piratik445 and splat003 - help me with testing discord status

To smash comets use mouse.
